data.client_settings: Desktop Stable build 26538, Desktop Canary build 26538
data.expected_result: A ban reason should be showing
data.short_description: Cannot view ban reasons on builds later than Sstable 26538
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a ban in a server with a pre-existing ban reason - Update to Stable build 26538 or later - View ban reason again, it will show No reason provided
